text: is a Japanese football player who plays for Finnish club IF Gnistan. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Nõmme Kalju *Meistriliiga (1): 2012 **Runner-up (2): 2011, 2013 ; Factor Ljubljana *Slovenian Second League (1): 2005–06 ; Gorica *Slovenian PrvaLiga Runner-up (1): 2008–09 ; Minsk *Belarusian Premier League 3rd (1): 2010 ===IndividualHidetoshi Wakui Official Website (Japanese)=== ;Nõmme Kalju *Meistriliiga Best Eleven of the Year (2) : 2011, 2012 *Meistriliiga Best Midfielder of the Year (2) : 2011, 2012 *Meistriliiga Best Player of the Year Runner-up (2) : 2011, 2012 *Meistriliiga Best Player of the Month (3) : August 2011, June 2012, March 2013 *2011 Meistriliiga Best Eleven of the Month (5) : March 2011, April 2011, June 2011, August 2011, September 2011 *Meistriliiga Best Transfer Runner-up (1) : 2011 ==Club statistics== {| border=1 style="border-collapse:collapse; font-size:100%;" cellpadding=3 cellspacing=0 width=100% |- bgcolor=#C1D8FF align=center !rowspan=2|Season !rowspan=2|Team !rowspan=2|Country !rowspan=2|DivisionLeague Division !colspan=4|League !colspan=3|Europe |- bgcolor=#C1D8FF align=center !
